oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Monroe County court case involving the murder of Anna Rodgers by Kirkland gang bushwhackers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Indictment for State vs. John Kirkland, William Kirkland, Samuel Rodgers, Joseph Phillips & Gale Roberts, former members of the 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA who became notorious bushwhackers in southeast TN. They are accused of shooting down Anna Rodgers on March 12, 1865. Although there are several warrants for the sheriff to bring in the accused, the Kirklands had fled into the mountains and were never apprehended for the crime. Anna may have been related to one of her killers.
